function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation in indoor spaces associated with increased transmission of respiratory infections.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory infection transmission, including SARS-CoV-2.","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems and air circulation in indoor spaces.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, and advanced HVAC systems.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, especially crowded or poorly ventilated areas.","Owner":"Building managers, facility maintenance personnel."},{"Description":"Transmission of respiratory droplets carrying SARS-CoV-2 prompted by airflow generated by air-conditioning.","Impact":"Increased risk of SARS-CoV-2 transmission in indoor spaces with air-conditioning.","Mitigation":"Optimize air-conditioning systems to minimize airflow and recirculation of air.","Technologies":"HVAC control systems, air quality sensors, and smart ventilation solutions.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces with air-conditioning.","Owner":"Building owners, HVAC system operators."},{"Description":"Aerosol transmission via central air supply or drainage system in confined spaces.","Impact":"Potential aerosol transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in indoor environments with central air supply or drainage systems.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of central air systems, use of air disinfection technologies.","Technologies":"UV-C air disinfection, air duct cleaning, and filtration systems.","People":"Occupants of buildings with central air supply and drainage systems.","Owner":"Building maintenance staff, facility managers."}]}
